LanguageData.CaesicMarshal72.baseDesc: They say that the Caesics soldiers are recruited from the dead. Rising through such ranks, most return whence they came. [PAWN_nameDef] dominated because of [PAWN_possessive] strategic genius, machine-like focus, and tolerance for suffering - both [PAWN_objective] own and that of others.
LanguageData.CaesicMarshal72.title: Caesic marshal
